PROS:
- Very thick cloud vape, fruity menthol flavor type
- Rechargeable (MicroUSB)
- Never dries out my throat
- Satisfying hit if you take a big hit to supress the cigarette urges
- Can change to 3 different flow levels....Low/Medium/High flow
CONS:
- Battery dies out pretty fast if you frequently hit it back to back
- Very square shape vape, doesnt bother me but might be too big for others who prefer a smaller vape
- Not Type-C
- Sometimes makes me cough, (My throat is a little sensitive tho)

I got the sour strawberry gummy and trust me when I say there are sooo many better juice and disposables that taste more accurately to strawberry AND/OR gummy ! i eventually got used to the taste and the battery does last pretty long but I doubt I will recommend this to anyone.
